### How to Install

The easiest way to use this template is via our CLI. Follow these steps:

<Steps>

<Step> Run the following command to start the CLI and install the template:</Step>

```bash
npx nyxbui@latest template
```

<Step> Follow the prompts: </Step>
   - Select the `saas` template.
   - Enter your project directory name.
   - Choose your package manager (npm, pnpm, yarn, bun).

<Step> The CLI will download the template, install dependencies, and optionally initialize a git repository. </Step>

<Step> Navigate to your project directory and start the development server: </Step>

```bash-session
cd <your-project-directory>
<package-manager> run dev
```
</Steps>

### What is this?

This is a cutting-edge landing page template designed specifically for SaaS products. Built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Framer Motion, it offers a perfect blend of performance, style, and interactivity.

### Who is this for?

This template is ideal for entrepreneurs, startups, and businesses looking to launch a new SaaS product quickly and professionally. If you want to focus on your product rather than spending time on frontend development or design, this template is your solution.

### Why should you use this?

- ✅ Accelerate your launch by saving 500+ hours of development time
- ✅ Leverage advanced animations without the learning curve
- ✅ Easily customizable to match your brand identity
- ✅ Effortless setup with 1-click download and installation
- ✅ Update content and images in just 5 minutes
- ✅ Seamless deployment to Vercel for instant global availability
- ✅ Deploy instantly with Vercel or self-host effortlessly using Coolify

### Key Features

- ✅ Comprehensive Landing Page with 14 strategically designed sections:
  - Engaging Header and Hero sections
  - Trust-building Logos and Testimonials sections
  - Compelling Problem, Solution, and How It Works sections
  - Conversion-focused Features, Pricing, and CTA sections
  - Informative FAQ and Blog sections
  - Professional Footer
- Integrated Blog using MDX for rich content creation
- Dark mode support for user preference
- Fully responsive design for all devices
- Comprehensive SEO optimization
- Dynamic OpenGraph images for enhanced social sharing
- Abundant animations and micro-interactions for a polished UX
- Clean, well-structured, and maintainable code
- Global theming with easy-to-adjust constants for colors, text, and more
- Flexible Deployment Options: Vercel for seamless cloud hosting or Coolify for self-hosted solutions
